mapper.select: select a.id,a.title,a.recommend,a.published,a.update_time,b.id as typeId,b.name as typeName from t_blog a,t_type b where a.type_id=b.id

select a.id, a.title, a.content, a.first_picture, a.flag, a.appreciation, a.share_statement, a.commentabled, a.published, a.recommend, a.description, a.type_id,a.tag_ids from t_blog a where a.id=#{id}
select DATE_FORMAT(update_time,'%Y') from t_blog order by update_time desc
select id,title,update_time,flag from t_blog where DATE_FORMAT(update_time,'%Y')=#{year} and published=1

select b.id,b.title,b.first_picture,b.description,b.views,b.update_time,t.name as typeName,u.avatar,u.nickname from t_blog b,t_type t,t_user u where b.type_id=t.id and b.user_id=u.id and b.type_id=#{typeId} and b.published=1

select b.id,b.title,b.first_picture,b.description,b.views,b.update_time,t.name as typeName,u.avatar,u.nickname from t_blog b,t_type t,t_user u where b.type_id=t.id and b.user_id=u.id and FIND_IN_SET(#{tagId}, b.tag_ids) and b.published=1

select b.id,b.title,b.first_picture,b.description,b.views,b.update_time,t.name as typeName,u.avatar,u.nickname from t_blog b,t_type t,t_user u where b.type_id=t.id and b.user_id=u.id and b.published=1 order by b.update_time desc
select id,title from t_blog where recommend=1 and published=1 order by update_time desc

select b.id,b.title,b.first_picture,b.description,b.views,b.update_time,t.name as typeName,u.avatar,u.nickname from t_blog b,t_type t,t_user u where b.type_id=t.id and b.user_id=u.id and b.published=1 and (b.title like CONCAT('%',#{query},'%') or b.content like CONCAT('%',#{query},'%')) order by b.update_time desc

select b.id,b.title,b.first_picture,b.flag,b.content,b.views,b.update_time,b.commentabled,b.appreciation,b.share_statement,b.tag_ids, u.avatar,u.nickname from t_blog b,t_user u where b.user_id=u.id and b.published=1 and b.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update t_blog set views=views+1 where id=#{id}
